snippet.title: King's Knight - Wrath of the Dark Dragon - Announcement Trailer (NA)
snippet.description:
KING'S KNIGHT -Wrath of the Dark Dragon- is a new action RPG mobile game from the FINAL FANTASY XV Universe for iOS and Android devices. Within FINAL FANTASY XV, Noctis and his friends can often be found playing this title during their downtime. 

For more information visit: http://www.finalfantasyxv.com/kingsknight

Pre-order Final Fantasy XV now at http://finalfantasy.com/buy 

Like what you see? Then be sure to follow us:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/ffxven 
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/ffxv 
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/ffxv
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/FinalFantasyXV
Website - http://www.finalfantasyxv.com
